DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. The aim of this trial is to evaluate the effect of somatropin (Norditropin®) on final height in children with Noonan syndrome having being treated for up to 10 years with somatropin (Norditropin®) for the attainment of an optimal final height in the original trial S/GHD/004/NOO.
DOC.brief_title: Somatropin Effect on Linear Growth and Final Height in Subjects With Noonan Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Participation in the original S/GHD/004/NOO trial or following the protocol for S/GHD/004/NOO without being randomised in the trial
